item.description:
Are you a trivia buff?  Even if you aren't, what would you say to a night out with friends and a discounted dinner? :-)

Tonight is STUMP Trivia night at a quaint little place on Route 1 in Danvers.  For more information, check out: http://stumptrivia.com/  Basically, we are going to form teams of 6 and answer trivia questions for 2 hours that could be about anything (although we are lacking sports knowledge, so if you know sports, we could really use you!).  If we win (and we are 2 for 2), the group wins gift certificates to pay for dinner the next time. :-)

IMPORTANT NOTE:
Since we won prize money, I am giving those who attended last time first chance at RSVPing in case they want to redeem it for food.  Then I will open up RSVPs to anyone else on a first come, first serve basis on March 5th.  Anyone who attends tonight will receive about $5 off their food due to redeeming our prize money.  And we will do individual checks this time to make the math easier.

2ND IMPORTANT NOTE:
If this event fills up with the same 12 people and you want to come, let me know!  We can support a third team and I can increase the RSVPs easily.  So don't feel like this is a closed group. :-) 

Please try to arrive on time so we can secure tables as the place gets filled up fast.

Hope to see you there! :-)

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Stump Trivia Night in Danvers
